Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
Board Stores the game board as a 2D array of Squares.
Piece A Piece on the game board that can be either red or black Pieces are taken into account when redrawing a Square on the game board and when a particular side runs out of pieces, the game is over
SimpleCheckersGUI Creates a new instance of Board and draws a necessary graphical interface for the user to select possible moves.
Square Represents a single square contained in Board, represented as a Canvas Also stores the occupant of this position on the board, and squares are aware of their position within the board.
 

Enum Summary
Square.BackgroundColor The background color that a square should be
